== common ==
M-f :: forward a word
M-b :: backward a word
M-< :: start
M-> :: end
M-gg :: specify
C-t :: interchange characters
M-t :: interchange words
C-x C-t :: interchange lines
C-x C-o :: delete continuous blank lines to only one
M-Space :: delete continuous blank to only one
M-\ :: delete all continuous blank
C-x l :: display number of lines
C-x o :: jump to other window
M-z char :: delete until char


== help ==
C-h v :: display variable



== misc ==
C-x 8 RET :: input a unicode
